prompts: Create a blue and yellow Pokemon with unique frog-like features and a playful personality.
Imagine a bipedal creature that thrives in wetlands, showcasing vibrant blue and orange colors.
Generate a Poison and Fighting type Pokemon resembling a small amphibian with distinctive markings.
Design a playful Pokemon with an unusual color palette, emphasizing its unique combat abilities.
Show me a Pokemon that blends into forest habitats, featuring striking blue and yellow accents.
Make a bipedal amphibious creature that stands out in urban environments with its bright colors.
Give me a Pokemon that combines both Poison and Fighting types, with an eye-catching appearance.
